NewsDetail.Title: New mobile-friendly university login page
NewsDetail.subTitle: Don't be concerned when you arrive at a new login page on December 28th.
NewsDetail.Abstract: When a login page changes, it can be a security flag. BYU-Idaho will be releasing a new login page and wants students and employees to be aware so they can trust the new page.
NewsDetail.Author: University Communications
NewsDetail.BodyCopy:
Mobile-friendly Login Page

Seeing a new login screen can be cause for alarm. So don't be surprised when you see a BYU-Idaho login screen with a slightly different look. On Wednesday, December 28th, BYU-Idaho's Information Technology Office will implement a new mobile-friendly login page. The page will feature a new header and footer that has been designed and developed in conjunction with the Univerisity Communications Web Services team. The header and footer will scale responsively to adjust to the size of the view port window. It will work well on a phone, a tablet and a desktop or laptop browser.

Â 

The header and footer on this page will soon be implemented on all university web pages and will also begin to be applied to other university service pages that are not hosted by BYU-Idaho (like the HR jobs site and the new Ticket Office online ticketing site).
